## SendableBitcoinsMoneyp class

Bitcoins-based implementation of [SendableMoneyp](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SendableBitcoinsMoneyp implements SendableMoneyp<BitcoinsTransactionReceipt, BitcoinsTransactionResponse> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [SendableMoneyp](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.md)<!-- -->&lt;[BitcoinsTransactionReceipt](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionreceipt.md)<!-- -->, [BitcoinsTransactionResponse](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;
